profile_summary:
Driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building robust and scalable applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in deploying cloud-native systems using **AWS** and **Azure**, with proficient skills in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform** to streamline CI/CD pipelines and ensure high-performance application delivery. Demonstrated ability in performance profiling, software architecture, designing with design patterns, and leveraging data structures for optimal system performance.

Strong background in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Effective communicator and collaborator, committed to enhancing team productivity with **AI productivity tools** and MLOps practices.
